CT Vision 1
  • CT Vision
    • 1

In this section, learn how to install, configure and work with CT Vision IR for CT Mobile 2.8 and lower.

+

Refer to Getting Started for detailed instructions on how to deploy and configure the CT Vision IR for further use according to your requirements.

When the CT Vision IR is configured, work with it in Salesforce and the CT Mobile app.
